price: Na siku watakapo kusanywa maadui wa Mwenyezi Mungu kwenye Moto, nao wakikgawanywa kwa makundi.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُحۡشَرُ أَعۡدَآءُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Siku watakapo kusanywa maadui wa Mwenyezi Mungu kupelekwa Motoni, wakawa wa mwanzo wao wanakutana na wa mwisho wao, ili ipate hoja ilazimike juu ya wote,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayawma yuḥ'sharu aʿdāu al-lahi ilā al-nāri fahum yūzaʿūna
